pci_projects_project_users_add_short_des: To access object storage, please add a user to your container. You can select an existing user or create a new user. Each user (OpenStack) will be linked to one or more S3 key pairs (S3 credentials), each consisting of an 'Access Key' and a 'Secret Key'.
pci_projects_project_users_add_success_m: S3 credentials for user {{user}} have been generated
pci_projects_project_users_add_error_mes: S3 credentials for user {{user}} could not be generated.
